components.name: NetCat Source
components.description: A netcat-like source that listens on a given port and turns each line of text into an event. Acts like nc -k -l [host] [port]. In other words, it opens a specified port and listens for data. The expectation is that the supplied data is newline separated text. Each line of text is turned into a Flume event and sent via the connected channel.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Host name or IP address to bind to

max-line-length.name: Max line length
max-line-length.description: Max line length per event body (in bytes)

ack-every-event.name: ACK every event
ack-every-event.description: Respond with an “OK” for every event received
